name: Gotta Find my Fruits! (of the Spirit!)
name_original: Gotta Find my Fruits! (of the Spirit!)
description:
Help Bible Bunny & Hymnal Hare Get Back the Stolen Fruits of the Spirit! The Evil Rock Monsters have hidden the Fruits of the Spirit! Find 10 Bibles to Unlock the Hidden Fruits of the Spirit! Bible Verse Signs have health on top of them!

This is my CDN Speed Game 2017 entry. My Theme verse is Zechariah 4:6 "Then he answered and spake unto me, saying, This is the word of the Lord unto Zerubbabel, saying, Not by might, nor by power, but by my spirit, saith the Lord of hosts."

With so many 3D platformers releasing in 2017, (Yooka-Laylee, Crash Bandicoot Trilogy, Super Mario Odyssey, Sonic Forces, Super Lucky's Tale, Skylar & Plux, Knack 2, A Hat in Time, Hob, Bubsy: Woolies Strike Back [I know the Bubsy game is actually 2.5D, but decided to add it to the list anyways) I wanted to try my hand at a Cute, Family Friendly Christian Themed 3D Platformer game.
-Featuring Bible Bunny (White Bunny) and Hymnal Hare (Grey Hare)!
-Featuring 3 stages (Sunny Spring, Sunset Sands, Sleepy Slushy)!
-Xbox 360 controller support (Untested on MacOS and Linux, tested and works on Windows)
-2 player split-screen co-op play (Not on Android, Just Windows, Mac, and Linux)!
-It has a Pause Game Feature and Rolling Credits!
I hope that you enjoy it! God Bless!

Controls P1 Keyboard:
WSAD - Move / V - FPS View / X - Crotch
Space - Jump / C - Target / P - Pause
Z - Action & Select / F - Sprint
R/Y - Zoom Camera In / Out
Q/E - Rotate Camera Left / Right

Controls P2 Keyboard:
Arrow Keys - Move / , - FPS View
N - Crotch / Enter - Jump / M - Target /
[ - Pause / B - Action & Select / K - Sprint
J/U - Zoom Camera In / Out
Y/I - Rotate Camera Left / Right

Controls P1 & P2 Xbox 360 Gamepad:
Left Stick - Move /
Click Left Stick - FPS View
RB - Crotch / X - Jump / B - Target /
Start - Pause / Y - Action & Select /
LB - Sprint
Right Stick L/R - Zoom Camera In / Out
LT/RT - Rotate Camera Left / Right

Jump then in the air hold Action for Stomp!
